title: Crime is a Race Problem
author: VD
content_html:
St. George splits from Baton Rouge and within a year no crime, safe streets, budget surplus, working schools, investment coming in, and peace. This is the future.

As I’ve previously demonstrated from FBI statistics, gun crime is also a race problem, not a gun problem. And the advent of widespread AI means that society’s ability to conceal this through rhetoric, equalitarian posturing, and social pressure is being eliminated.

As nations from Britain to Sweden have discovered, immigration means crime, especially violence and rape.

Civil rights, integration, and anti-racism means crime and a dysfunctional society. Segregation means peace and a functional society.

Everywhere around the world, people will choose the latter. It is inevitable. After all, where do you think all those homogeneous societies came from in the first place?
